轐字的基本解释

轐
bú
车伏兔，即垫在车箱和车轴之间的木块。亦称“輹”。

轐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bú］
［《廣韻》薄沃切，入沃，並。］
［《廣韻》博木切，入屋，幫。］
车伏兔。古代车箱下面钩住车轴的木头，其形如伏兔。

轐字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　轐； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1248第37
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?博木切，音濮。【說文】車伏兔也。【周禮·冬官考工記】加軫與轐焉。【註】車軸圜，故加轐使平以安軫也，狀如伏兔。互詳前輹字註。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?蒲沃切，音樸。義同。

轐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
轐字的起名意思

暂无。

Shi
Basic explanation of words
Shi
bú
Car Futu, the wooden block between the car box and the axle. Also known as "輹".
Shi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bú］
["Guang Yun" Bo Wo cut, enter Wo, and. ]
["Guangyun" Bo Muqie, enter the house, help. ]
Car Futu. The wood that hooked the axle under the ancient carriage was shaped like a rabbit.
Shi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　轐; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1248 Page 37
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Bo Muqie, Yinpu. [Said the text] Car Futu also. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] Jia Zhen and Zhen Yan. [Note] Axle is round, so add 轐 to make it flat and stable, like a rabbit. Mutual details before the word note.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Pu Woqie, sound Pu. The same meaning.
